page.title: 09Occupations in Clapham
page.content: My dad is a policeman and works at the R.A.E. in Clapham and my mum works in Kempston as a Health Visitor. Nearly everybody has a job except for a few unemployed people. These are places where some of them work Ampthill, Bedford, Biggleswade, Cambridge, Clapham, Harrold, Kempston, London, Luton, abroad, travelling and many more. We have one factory up Green Lane called M. and S. Packaging. They make boxes and record sleeves. Not many people work in Clapham because it is small and there are not very many jobs. There are not many shops because there isn't any room to fit them in. Twenty two grownups work at Ursula Taylor School and they have to look after about 14O children.
